ActJudges Act
PrecisGranting of a LEAVE OF ABSENCE to eight Judges, from September 1, 2005 to March 31, 2006, in order to allow them to participate in the NATIONAL JUDICIAL STUDY LEAVE FELLOWSHIP PROGRAM.
